Package org.settings4j

Interface Summary
Connector An implementation of this Interface can return Values for a given key.
ContentResolver a ContentResolver is a Helper for read/write byte[] content for a given key.
Filter Interface to implement an cumied filter.
ObjectResolver The ObjectResolver is a Helper to resolve byte[] Content to a Java Object.
Settings4jFactory Create a new instance of Settings-Interface.
Settings4jInstance SettingsInstance is used to get simply access to Application settings.
Settings4jRepository Holder for a single Settings4jInstance.
 

Class Summary
Constants Some Constants like the Return Values (success or not) of Connectors.set*(...)
Settings4j Settings is used to get simply access to Application settings.
